DataElement.preferredName: Medical Outcomes Study Social Support Survey How Often Available Someone to Share Your Most Private Worries and Fears With Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated perception of how much time someone is available to share their most private worries and fears with, using a 5 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Medical Outcomes Study Social Support Survey How Often Available Someone to Share Your Most Private Worries and Fears With Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A survey of multiple dimensions of social support._The number of occurrences of something within a given time period. (NCI)_The quality of being obtainable or accessible and ready for use or service._A question about whether an individual has someone to share their most private worries and fears with._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
